page.title: 07 KINGSDOWN GOLF CLUB.
page.content: On{Kingsdown golf course}there are{3 {stones}and the{legend}is that{3 kings died in battle and were {buried}there and{stones}put on top of them.Some say that the stones were{the meeting {point of 3 Anglo _ Saxon territories . Up until 1880 the land was used as a {sheep fair.}The land was owned by the {Northey family}and then was bought by {Kingsdown golf club}at the end of the last century.The club covers{125 acres On the site there is a{club house}with {office}and{professional shop}and{2 {bungalows}where the{steward}and {greenkeeper}live.The barn is used for storing machinery.The golf course is surrounded by{farmland}and the village of{Kingsdown.}Today,there are{620}playing members and they come from nearby towns.Everybody who comes enjoys one of the most scenic and cheapest golf clubs in Wiltshire.
